channel.title: Abouts on bheisler.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on bheisler.github.io

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I’m Brook Heisler. I’m a software developer from Saskatoon. When I’m not busy programming, I spend my time propmaking instead. This is reflected in the dual nature of this blog, which is mostly about my hobby projects. Here, you’ll find detailed build logs about my prop projects and even-more-detailed information on my code projects, as well as whatever else I feel like writing about. If you’re only interested in one of those two things, that’s cool - use the category links above to focus on only code or only props. There are even separate RSS feeds. Cheers!
